LOG_IN.TITLE: {Spanish} Log in with your Admin Credentials.
LOG_IN.SUB_TITLE: {Spanish} Take control of your health and well-being with Consent2Share.
LOG_IN.NO_PERMISSION_MSG: {Spanish} Sorry, you do not have permission to access this site.

PAGE_NOT_FOUND.TITLE: {Spanish} Inconceivable!
PAGE_NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: {Spanish} I do not think this page is where you think it is.

NOTIFICATION_MSG.NO_ENOUGH_PROVIDERS: {Spanish} You don't have enough providers to create consent. Please add providers.

HOME.WELCOME_SUB_TITLE: {spanish} You are now ready to manage your patients.

CARD_LIST.NO_CONSENTS_MSG: Actualmente no hay consentimientos disponibles. Haga clic en el botón Añadir un consentimiento para crear un nuevo consentimiento.

CARD.SHARE_ALL_MEDICAL_INFORMATION: Toda mi información médica puede ser compartida.

SAVED_STAGE.APPLY_TRY_POLICY_OPTION_TEXT: Probar las Selecciones de Mi Consentimiento en Mi Registro Médico antes de Compartir

SIGNED_STAGE.APPLY_TRY_POLICY_OPTION_TEXT: Probar las Selecciones de Mi Consentimiento en Mi Registro Médico antes de Compartir

REVOKED_STAGE.APPLY_TRY_POLICY_OPTION_TEXT: Probar las Selecciones de Mi Consentimiento en Mi Registro Médico antes de Compartir

DELETE_CONSENT_DIALOG.TITLE: Eliminar consentimiento
DELETE_CONSENT_DIALOG.CONTENT: ¿Está seguro de que desea eliminar este consentimiento?

MEDICAL_INFORMATION.TITLE: Información médica
MEDICAL_INFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Seleccione cómo le gustaría compartir su información médica.
MEDICAL_INFORMATION.SHARE_ALL_RADIO: <strong> COMPARTE </ strong> mi expediente médico <strong> SIN NINGUNA EXCEPCIÓN </ strong> de categorías de información médica.
MEDICAL_INFORMATION.SHARE_SOME_RADIO: <strong> COMPARTE </ strong> mi expediente médico <strong> CON EXCEPCIÓN </ strong> de categorías específicas de información médica.

DIALOG.TITLE: La configuración de privacidad
DIALOG.SHARE_ALL_PARAGRAPH: {spanish} You have chosen to share all of your medical record without any exception.
DIALOG.NOT_SHARE_ALL_PARAGRAPH: {spanish} Please select the medical information that you want to share.
DIALOG.FED_DESCRIPTION: {spanish} Federal requirements strictly restrict health professionals from disclosing substance abuse treatment information without signed patient consent (called 42 CFR Part 2 ). You have the right to choose the information you wish to share or not share and with whom.
DIALOG.STATE_DESCRIPTION: La mayoría de los estados tienen leyes que restringen a los profesionales de la salud de revelar información relacionada con el abuso de sustancias, el VIH / SIDA y la salud mental. '+' Algunos estados tienen restricciones con respecto a la información genética y las enfermedades transmisibles. Usted tiene el derecho de elegir la información que desea compartir o no compartir y con quién.
DIALOG.WARNING_ONE: {spanish} Please select the "Share my medical record without any exceptions" option,if you want to share all of your health information.
DIALOG.WARNING_TWO: {spanish} Please select AT LEAST ONE category that you want to share.

PURPOSE_OF_USE.TITLE: Propósito de uso
PURPOSE_OF_USE.DESCRIPTION: Elija con qué fines puede utilizarse su información médica.
PURPOSE_OF_USE.SHARE_TEXT: COMPARTA mi historial médico SOLAMENTE para los fines de uso seleccionados.

DIALOG.TITLE: Compartir para el propósito seleccionado
DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: Compartir mi información sólo con fines específicos de uso.

SELECT_PROVIDER.DESCRIPTION: Seleccione una persona u organización autorizada para compartir su información:

TERMS.TITLE: Términos de consentimiento
TERMS.TEXT: Ingrese una fecha de inicio y finalización durante la cual se compartirán sus registros médicos.
TERMS.ERROR_PAST_START_DATE: La fecha de inicio debe estar en el presente.
TERMS.ERROR_PAST_END_DATE: La fecha de finalización debe estar en el presente.
TERMS.ERROR_END_DATE_BEFORE_START: La fecha de inicio debe continuar la fecha de finalización.

CONSENT_SIGN.TITLE: Consentimiento para compartir mi información médica

HEALTH_INFORMATION_SECTION.TITLE: INFORMACIÓN SANITARIA A REVELAR
HEALTH_INFORMATION_SECTION.SHARE_MEDICAL_INFO: Para COMPARTIR la siguiente información médica
HEALTH_INFORMATION_SECTION.SHARE_PURPOSES: Para COMPARTIR para el siguiente propósito (s)

CONSENT_TERMS_SECTION.TITLE: TÉRMINOS DE CONSENTIMIENTO
CONSENT_TERMS_SECTION.TERMS: Yo, {{name}}, por la presente acepto, y entiendo los términos de este consentimiento.

CONFIRM_DIALOG.TITLE: Por favor, autentifique
CONFIRM_DIALOG.CONTENT: Proporcione su contraseña de cuenta para autenticar y complete la firma electrónica
CONFIRM_DIALOG.AUTHENTICATE_MSG: No se pudo autenticar, inténtalo de nuevo.

COMPLETE_DIALOG.TITLE: El éxito en el consentimiento firmado creado
COMPLETE_DIALOG.CLICK_TO_DOWNLOAD_MSG: {spanish} Click to download the signed consent

CONSENT_REVOKE.TITLE: {spanish} Revocation of Consent to Share My Health Information

CONFIRM_DIALOG.TITLE: Por favor, autentifique
CONFIRM_DIALOG.CONTENT: Proporcione su contraseña de cuenta para autenticar y complete la firma electrónica
CONFIRM_DIALOG.AUTHENTICATE_MSG: No se pudo autenticar, inténtalo de nuevo.

COMPLETE_DIALOG.TITLE: {spanish} Successfully Revoked Consent
COMPLETE_DIALOG.CLICK_TO_DOWNLOAD_MSG: {spanish} Click to download the signed consent revocation

CONSENT_REVOKE.TERMS: I, {{name}}, hereby accept and understand the terms of this consent.

NOTIFICATION_MSG.SUCCESS_CREATING_CONSENT: {spanish} Successfully created the consent on behalf of the patient.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_CREATING_CONSENT: {spanish} Error in creating the consent on behalf of the patient.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.SUCCESS_UPDATING_CONSENT: {spanish} Successfully updated the consent on behalf of the patient.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_UPDATING_CONSENT: {spanish} Error in updating the consent on behalf of the patient.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.SUCCESS_SIGN_CONSENT: {spanish} Successfully attested the consent on behalf of the patient.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_SIGN_CONSENT: {spanish} Error in attesting the consent on behalf of the patient.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.SUCCESS_REVOKE_CONSENT: {spanish} Successfully revoked the consent on behalf of the patient.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_REVOKE_CONSENT: {spanish} Error in revoking consent on behalf of the patient.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.SUCCESS_DOWNLOAD_SAVED_CONSENT: {spanish} Success in downloading the saved consent.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_DOWNLOAD_SAVED_CONSENT: {spanish} Failed to download the saved consent. Please try again later.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.SUCCESS_DOWNLOAD_SIGNED_CONSENT: {spanish} Success in downloading the signed consent.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_DOWNLOAD_SIGNED_CONSENT: {spanish} Failed to download the signed consent. Please try again later.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_DOWNLOAD_REVOKED_CONSENT: {spanish} Failed to download the revoked consent. Please try again later.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_DELETE_CONSENT: {spanish} Failed to delete the consent. Please try again later.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_APPLY_TRY_POLICY: {spanish} Failed to try this consent setting against the patient medical record. Please try again later.

LIST.TITLE: {spanish} My Patients
LIST.INFO: {spanish} OK! You are now ready to manage your patients.
LIST.SEARCH_PATIENT_PLACEHOLDER: {spanish} Search by first and last name
LIST.NO_PATIENTS_MSG: {spanish} There are currently no patients available. Please click the 'Create a Patient Account' button to create a new patient.

SEARCH.TITLE: {spanish} Search Patient
SEARCH.INFO: {spanish} OK! You are now ready to manage your patients.
SEARCH.NO_PATIENTS_MSG: {spanish}No results found. Please try again, or create a new patient.

CREATE_EDIT.INFO: {spanish} Please complete all required fields to create a patient account.

CONFIRM_DIALOG.TITLE: {spanish} Confirm Navigation
CONFIRM_DIALOG.CONTENT: {spanish} You will lose all unsaved work. Are you sure you want to leave this page?

DUPLICATE_CHECK_CONFIRM_DIALOG.TITLE: {spanish} Confirm Account Creation
DUPLICATE_CHECK_CONFIRM_DIALOG.CONTENT: {spanish} ATTENTION – An account with similar information already exists. Please confirm the accuracy of the account information entered and select to either "Continue and Create" or go "Back to Search" screen and try again.

CONTENT.LABEL: {spanish} Activate Account for:
CONTENT.RESENT_VERIFICATION_CODE_MSG: {spanish} An email has been sent and awaiting the patient to activate the account. Select the 'Send Email' button to re-send an account activation email.
CONTENT.SENT_VERIFICATION_CODE_MSG: {spanish} Select the 'Send Email' button to generate the Verification Code.Sending an account activation email to the address listed above will generate a unique Verification Code.

SEGMENT_DOCUMENT.WARNING: {spanish} Set the options to segment this document according to the consent selected.
SEGMENT_DOCUMENT.GET_PROVIDER_NOTIFICATION_MSG: {spanish} Failed to get provider by NPI...

NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_SENT_EMAIL: {spanish}Failed to send email. Please try again later.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_ENABLE_ACCOUNT: {spanish}Failed to enable user account. Please try again later.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_DISABLE_ACCOUNT: {spanish}Failed to disable account. Please try again later.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_SEARCH_PATIENT: {spanish}Failed to search patient. Please try again later.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_CREATE_PATIENT: {spanish}Failed to create patient. Please try again later.
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_UPDATE_PATIENT: {spanish}Failed to update patient. Please try again later.

CARD_LIST.ADD_PROVIDER_BUTTON: Agregar un proveedor de servicios de salud
CARD_LIST.NO_PROVIDERS_MSG: {spanish} There are currently no providers available. Please click the 'Add a Health Provider' button to create a new provider.
